policy add-safe-to-evict applied to priyo/Deployment/api:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: api
  name: api
  namespace: priyo
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: api
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: api
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: POSTGRES_USER
              name: api
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
              name: api
        - name: POSTGRES_DB
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: POSTGRES_DB
              name: api
        - name: POSTGRES_HOST
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: POSTGRES_HOST
              name: api
        image: us-central1-docker.pkg.dev/brilliant-dock-408207/priyo/go-react-postgres/api:1.0.2
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "2"
            memory: 3Gi
          requests:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 2Gi

##### FILE: api.deployment2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/gnomad-api:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: gnomad-browser
    component: api
  name: gnomad-api
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      component: api
      name: gnomad-api
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: gnomad-browser
        component: api
        name: gnomad-api
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PORT
          value: "8000"
        - name: ELASTICSEARCH_URL
          value: http://gnomad-es-http:9200
        - name: ELASTICSEARCH_USERNAME
          value: elastic
        - name: ELASTICSEARCH_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: elastic
              name: gnomad-es-elastic-user
        - name: REDIS_HOST
          value: redis
        - name: REDIS_PORT
          value: "6379"
        - name: TRUST_PROXY
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: ips
              name: proxy-ips
        - name: MAX_CONCURRENT_ES_REQUESTS
          value: "10"
        - name: MAX_QUEUED_ES_REQUESTS
          value: "100"
        - name: MAX_REQUESTS_PER_MINUTE
          value: "30"
        - name: MAX_QUERY_COST
          value: "25"
        - name: MAX_QUERY_COST_PER_MINUTE
          value: "300"
        image: us-docker.pkg.dev/exac-gnomad/gnomad/gnomad-api
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
          name: http
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health/ready
            port: http
          initialDelaySeconds: 3
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "2"
            memory: 4Gi
          requests:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 3Gi
      serviceAccountName: gnomad-api

---

##### FILE: api_combined_deployment_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to development/Deployment/go-api-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: go-api-deployment
  namespace: development
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: go-api
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: go-api
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: GIN_MODE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: GIN_MODE
              name: api-config
        - name: LOG_FILE_PATH
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: LOG_FILE_PATH
              name: api-config
        - name: DATABASE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: DATABASE_NAME
              name: api-secrets
        - name: DATABASE_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: DATABASE_USER
              name: api-secrets
        - name: DATABASE_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: DATABASE_PASSWORD
              name: api-secrets
        - name: DATABASE_HOST
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DATABASE_HOST
              name: api-config
        - name: DATABASE_PORT
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: DATABASE_PORT
              name: api-secrets
        - name: SERVICE_PORT
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: SERVICE_PORT
              name: api-secrets
        - name: BASIC_AUTH_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: BASIC_AUTH_USER
              name: api-secrets
        - name: BASIC_AUTH_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: BASIC_AUTH_PASSWORD
              name: api-secrets
        - name: JWT_SECRET_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: JWT_SECRET_KEY
              name: api-secrets
        - name: JWT_EXPIRATION_TIME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: JWT_EXPIRATION_TIME
              name: api-secrets
        image: satyamvatstyagi/user-management-service:1.0.1
        name: go-api-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 64Mi

---

              name: pl-service-config
        - name: PL_MD_INDEX_NAME
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: PL_MD_INDEX_NAME
              name: pl-indexer-config
        - name: PL_CONFIG_MANAGER_SERVICE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: PL_CONFIG_MANAGER_SERVICE
              name: pl-service-config
        - name: PL_SEGMENT_WRITE_KEY
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: write-key
              name: segment-config
        - name: PL_CRON_SCRIPT_SERVICE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: PL_CRON_SCRIPT_SERVICE
              name: pl-service-config
        - name: PL_VIZIER_IMAGE_SECRET_PATH
          value: /vizier-image-secret
        - name: PL_VIZIER_IMAGE_SECRET_FILE
          value: vizier_image_secret.json
        - name: PL_ELASTIC_USERNAME
          value: elastic
        - name: PL_ELASTIC_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: elastic
              name: pl-elastic-es-elastic-user
        - name: PL_ELASTIC_CA_CERT
          value: /elastic-certs-pub/tls.crt
        - name: PL_WORK_DOMAIN
          value: work.$(PL_DOMAIN_NAME)
        - name: PL_KRATOS_BROWSER_URL
          value: https://$(PL_WORK_DOMAIN)/oauth/kratos
        - name: PL_HYDRA_BROWSER_URL
          value: https://$(PL_WORK_DOMAIN)/oauth/hydra
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: pl-tls-config
        - configMapRef:
            name: pl-domain-config
        - configMapRef:
            name: pl-ory-service-config
        - configMapRef:
            name: pl-auth-connector-config
        - configMapRef:
            name: pl-errors-config
            optional: true
        image: cloud-api_server_image
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 51200
            scheme: HTTPS
        name: api-server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 51200
          name: http2
        - containerPort: 51201
          name: metrics-http
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 51200
            scheme: HTTPS
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 10100
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /certs
          name: certs
        - mountPath: /vizier-image-secret
          name: vizier-image-secret
        - mountPath: /elastic-certs-pub
          name: elastic-certs-pub
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 10100
        seccompProfile:
          type: RuntimeDefault
      volumes:
      - name: certs
        secret:
          secretName: service-tls-certs
      - name: vizier-image-secret
        secret:
          optional: true
          secretName: vizier-image-secret
      - configMap:
          name: proxy-envoy-config
        name: envoy-yaml
      - name: elastic-certs-pub
        secret:
          secretName: pl-elastic-es-http-certs-public

kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: neuro-clash-api-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1

    matchLabels:
      app: neuro-clash-api
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: neuro-clash-api
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: NEURO_CLASH_API_HOST
          value: 127.0.0.1
        - name: NEURO_CLASH_API_PORT
          value: "5000"
        - name: NEURO_CLASH_WEB_APP_HOST
          value: neuro-clash.com
        - name: NEURO_CLASH_WEB_APP_PORT
          value: "80"
        - name: NEURO_CLASH_AI_HOST
          value: neuro-clash-ai-service
        - name: NEURO_CLASH_AI_PORT
          value: "80"
        image: ghcr.io/cognitivecontrollab/neuro-clash-api:latest
        name: neuro-clash-api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: ghcr-login-secret

##### FILE: api_deployment5.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/go-api-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: go-api-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: go-api
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: go-api
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: GIN_MODE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: GIN_MODE
              name: api-config
        - name: LOG_FILE_PATH
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: LOG_FILE_PATH
              name: api-config
        - name: DATABASE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: DATABASE_NAME
              name: api-secrets
        - name: DATABASE_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: DATABASE_USER
              name: api-secrets
        - name: DATABASE_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: DATABASE_PASSWORD
              name: api-secrets
        - name: DATABASE_HOST
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DATABASE_HOST
              name: api-config
        - name: DATABASE_PORT
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: DATABASE_PORT
              name: api-secrets
        - name: SERVICE_PORT
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: SERVICE_PORT
              name: api-secrets
        - name: BASIC_AUTH_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: BASIC_AUTH_USER
              name: api-secrets
        - name: BASIC_AUTH_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: BASIC_AUTH_PASSWORD
              name: api-secrets
        - name: JWT_SECRET_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: JWT_SECRET_KEY
              name: api-secrets
        - name: JWT_EXPIRATION_TIME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: JWT_EXPIRATION_TIME
              name: api-secrets
        image: satyamvatstyagi/user-management-service:1.0.1
        name: go-api-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080

---

##### FILE: api_replicaset.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ReplicaSet/go-api-replicaset:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: ReplicaSet
metadata:
  name: go-api-replicaset
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: go-api
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: go-api
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: GIN_MODE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: GIN_MODE
              name: api-config
        - name: LOG_FILE_PATH
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: LOG_FILE_PATH
              name: api-config
        - name: DATABASE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: DATABASE_NAME
              name: api-secrets
        - name: DATABASE_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: DATABASE_USER
              name: api-secrets
        - name: DATABASE_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: DATABASE_PASSWORD
              name: api-secrets
        - name: DATABASE_HOST
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DATABASE_HOST
              name: api-config
        - name: DATABASE_PORT
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: DATABASE_PORT
              name: api-secrets
        - name: SERVICE_PORT
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: SERVICE_PORT
              name: api-secrets
        - name: BASIC_AUTH_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: BASIC_AUTH_USER
              name: api-secrets
        - name: BASIC_AUTH_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: BASIC_AUTH_PASSWORD
              name: api-secrets
        - name: JWT_SECRET_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: JWT_SECRET_KEY
              name: api-secrets
        - name: JWT_EXPIRATION_TIME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: JWT_EXPIRATION_TIME
              name: api-secrets
        image: satyamvatstyagi/user-management-service:1.0.1
        name: go-api-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080

---

kind: StatefulSet

    app: dify-api

  name: dify-api
  namespace: dify

  minReadySeconds: 10
  replicas: 1

      app: dify-api
  serviceName: dify-api

        app: dify-api
    spec:

      - env:
        - name: MODE
          value: api
        - name: LOG_LEVEL
          value: DEBUG
        - name: SECRET_KEY
          value: sk-xxxx

          value: https://dify.example.com
        - name: INIT_PASSWORD
          value: password

              key: pg-username

              key: pg-password

        image: langgenius/dify-api:0.6.9
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: dify-api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5001
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 2Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 256Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app/api/storage
          name: dify-api-storage
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /root/dify/app/api/storage
      type: DirectoryOrCreate
    name: dify-api-storage

---

##### FILE: api12.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/numbers-api:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: numbers
    kiamol: ch19
  name: numbers-api
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: numbers
      component: api
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: numbers
        component: api
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - numbers
              - key: component
                operator: In
                values:
                - api
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - image: kiamol/ch03-numbers-api
        name: api

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kiamol-ch14-test/Deployment/numbers-api:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: numbers-api
  namespace: kiamol-ch14-test
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: numbers-api
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/path: /probe
        prometheus.io/port: "9115"
        prometheus.io/target: http://127.0.0.1/healthz
      labels:
        app: numbers-api
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: FailAfterCallCount
          value: "3"
        image: kiamol/ch03-numbers-api
        name: api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: api
      - image: prom/blackbox-exporter:v0.17.0
        name: exporter
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9115
          name: metrics

---

        app: numbers
        component: api
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - numbers
              - key: component
                operator: In
                values:
                - api
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - image: kiamol/ch03-numbers-api
        name: api

---

##### FILE: api35_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to rng/DaemonSet/numbers-api:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  name: numbers-api
  namespace: rng
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: numbers-api
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: numbers-api
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: kiamol/ch03-numbers-api
        name: api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app/config-override/
          name: rng-key
          readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - name: rng-key
        secret:
          secretName: numbers-api-rng-key

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kiamol-ch13-test/Deployment/numbers-api:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: numbers-api
  namespace: kiamol-ch13-test
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: numbers-api
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: numbers-api
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: FailAfterCallCount
          value: "1"
        - name: UseFailureId
          value: "true"
        image: kiamol/ch03-numbers-api
        name: api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: api

##### FILE: api43_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kiamol-ch14-test/Deployment/numbers-api:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: numbers-api
  namespace: kiamol-ch14-test
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: numbers-api
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/path: /probe
        prometheus.io/port: "9115"
        prometheus.io/target: http://127.0.0.1/healthz
      labels:
        app: numbers-api
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: FailAfterCallCount
          value: "3"
        image: kiamol/ch03-numbers-api
        name: api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: api
      - image: prom/blackbox-exporter:v0.17.0
        name: exporter
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9115
          name: metrics

---

##### FILE: api49.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/numbers-api:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: numbers
    kiamol: ch19
  name: numbers-api
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: numbers
      component: api
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: numbers
        component: api
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - numbers
              - key: component
                operator: In
                values:
                - api
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - image: kiamol/ch03-numbers-api
        name: api

---

##### FILE: api51_3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/akademia-api-ingress:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    cert-manager.io/cluster-issuer: letsencrypt-prod
    kubernetes.io/ingress.class: nginx
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/backend-protocol: HTTP
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/rewrite-target: /
  labels:
    app: api
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: akademia-api
  name: akademia-api-ingress
  namespace: default
spec:
  defaultBackend:
    service:
      name: akademia-api-service
      port:
        number: 3000
  ingressClassName: nginx
  rules:
  - host: api.akademia.cc
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: akademia-api-service
            port:
              number: 3000
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix
  - host: akademia-api.arctix.dev
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: akademia-api-service
            port:
              number: 3000
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix
  tls:
  - hosts:
    - api.akademia.cc
    - akademia-api.arctix.dev
    secretName: api-akademia-cc-tls

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: api
  name: api
  namespace: taskapp
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: api
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: api
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: NGINX_PORT
          value: "80"
        - name: SERVER_NAME
          value: nginx-api
        - name: BACKEND_HOST
          value: localhost:8180
        - name: BACKEND_MAX_FAILS
          value: "3"
        - name: BACKEND_FAIL_TIMEOUT
          value: 10s
        image: ghcr.io/gihyodocker/taskapp-nginx-api:v1.0.0
        name: nginx-api
      - args:
        - server
        - --config-file=/run/secrets/api/api-config.yaml
        image: ghcr.io/gihyodocker/taskapp-api:v1.0.0
        name: api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8180
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/run/secrets/api
          name: api-config
          readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - name: api-config
        secret:
          items:
          - key: api-config.yaml
            path: api-config.yaml
          secretName: api-config

---

1 - autogen-require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule autogen-require-image-tag failed at path /image/

1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Deployment/numbers-api failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

##### FILE: api6_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kiamol-ch14-test/Deployment/numbers-api:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: numbers-api
  namespace: kiamol-ch14-test
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: numbers-api
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/path: /probe
        prometheus.io/port: "9115"
        prometheus.io/target: http://127.0.0.1/healthz
      labels:
        app: numbers-api
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: FailAfterCallCount
          value: "3"
        image: kiamol/ch03-numbers-api
        name: api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: api
      - image: prom/blackbox-exporter:v0.17.0
        name: exporter
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9115
          name: metrics

---

  template:

##### FILE: api69.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/numbers-api:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: numbers
    kiamol: ch19
  name: numbers-api
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: numbers
      component: api
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: numbers
        component: api
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - numbers
              - key: component
                operator: In
                values:
                - api
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - image: kiamol/ch03-numbers-api
        name: api

---

          value: postgres

##### FILE: api77.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/api:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: api
  name: api
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: api
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: api
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: NGINX_PORT
          value: "80"
        - name: SERVER_NAME
          value: nginx-api
        - name: BACKEND_HOST
          value: localhost:8180
        - name: BACKEND_MAX_FAILS
          value: "3"
        - name: BACKEND_FAIL_TIMEOUT
          value: 10s
        image: ghcr.io/gihyodocker/taskapp-nginx-api:v0.1.0
        name: nginx-api
      - args:
        - server
        - --config-file=/run/secrets/api/api-config.yaml
        image: ghcr.io/gihyodocker/taskapp-api:v0.1.0
        name: api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8180
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/run/secrets/api
          name: api-config
          readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - name: api-config
        secret:
          items:
          - key: api-config.yaml
            path: api-config.yaml
          secretName: api-config

---

##### FILE: api78.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/api:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: api
  name: api
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: api
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: api
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: NGINX_PORT
          value: "80"
        - name: SERVER_NAME
          value: nginx-api
        - name: BACKEND_HOST
          value: localhost:8180
        - name: BACKEND_MAX_FAILS
          value: "3"
        - name: BACKEND_FAIL_TIMEOUT
          value: 10s
        image: ghcr.io/gihyodocker/taskapp-nginx-api:v0.1.0
        name: nginx-api
      - args:
        - server
        - --config-file=/run/secrets/api/api-config.yaml
        image: ghcr.io/gihyodocker/taskapp-api:v0.1.0
        name: api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8180
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/run/secrets/api
          name: api-config
          readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - name: api-config
        secret:
          items:
          - key: api-config.yaml
            path: api-config.yaml
          secretName: api-config

---

    matchLabels:

          --timeout 0
        envFrom:

            name: api-config

        imagePullPolicy: Always

##### FILE: API79_3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/api-worker:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: api-worker
  name: api-worker
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: api-worker
  serviceName: api-worker
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: api-worker
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - bash
        - -c
        - celery --app=app.celery.app worker --concurrency=1 -Ofair -l info
        env:
        - name: PYTHONUNBUFFERED
          value: "0"
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: api-config
        image: ilia999x/backend-api:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: api-worker
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 302m
      - command:
        - bash
        - -c
        - celery --app=app.celery.app beat -l info
        env:
        - name: PYTHONUNBUFFERED
          value: "0"
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: api-config
        image: ilia999x/backend-api:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: api-beat1
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 302m
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: dockerregkey

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/api:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: api
  name: api
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: api
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: api
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: NGINX_PORT
          value: "80"
        - name: SERVER_NAME
          value: nginx-api
        - name: BACKEND_HOST
          value: localhost:8180
        - name: BACKEND_MAX_FAILS
          value: "3"
        - name: BACKEND_FAIL_TIMEOUT
          value: 10s
        image: ghcr.io/gihyodocker/taskapp-nginx-api:v0.1.0
        name: nginx-api
      - args:
        - server
        - --config-file=/run/secrets/api/api-config.yaml
        image: ghcr.io/gihyodocker/taskapp-api:v0.1.0
        name: api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8180
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/run/secrets/api
          name: api-config
          readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - name: api-config
        secret:
          items:
          - key: api-config.yaml
            path: api-config.yaml
          secretName: api-config

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: api
  name: api
  namespace: taskapp
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: api
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: api
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: NGINX_PORT
          value: "80"
        - name: SERVER_NAME
          value: nginx-api
        - name: BACKEND_HOST
          value: localhost:8180
        - name: BACKEND_MAX_FAILS
          value: "3"
        - name: BACKEND_FAIL_TIMEOUT
          value: 10s
        image: ghcr.io/gihyodocker/taskapp-nginx-api:v1.0.0
        name: nginx-api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 200Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 100Mi
      - args:
        - server
        - --config-file=/run/secrets/api/api-config.yaml
        image: ghcr.io/gihyodocker/taskapp-api:v1.0.0
        name: api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8180
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 200Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/run/secrets/api
          name: api-config
          readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - name: api-config
        secret:
          items:
          - key: api-config.yaml
            path: api-config.yaml
          secretName: api-config

apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1

metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: api

  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system

kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/rewrite-target: /$2
  name: api-ingress
  namespace: api
spec:
  rules:
  - http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: api-service
            port:
              number: 8080
        path: /*(/|$)(.*)
        pathType: Prefix

  name: autoapp
  namespace: default

  replicas: 1
  selector:

      name: autoapp
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        name: autoapp
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: abhithshaji/autoapp:1.3
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: autoapp
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 400m
            memory: 450Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 300m
            memory: 400Mi
        stdin: true
        tty: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /organizations
          name: data
          subPath: organizations
      volumes:
      - name: data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mypvc
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: config.json
            mode: 356
            path: config.json
          name: ca-client-config
        name: ca-client-config

            secretKeyRef:

              name: postgres-secret

            secretKeyRef:
              key: postgres-password
              name: postgres-secret

          valueFrom:

              key: postgres-url
              name: postgres-config

##### FILE: apiext-deployment_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to dynamic_parameters/Deployment/emissary-apiext:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels: null
  name: emissary-apiext
  namespace: dynamic_parameters
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels: null
  template:
    metadata:
      labels: null
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --crd-label-selector
        - app.kubernetes.io/part-of=emissary-apiext
        command:
        - apiext
        - dynamic_parameters
        image: dynamic_parameters
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /probes/live
            port: 8080
            scheme: HTTP
          periodSeconds: 3
        name: emissary-apiext
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /probes/ready
            port: 8080
            scheme: HTTP
          periodSeconds: 3
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 10
          httpGet:
            path: /probes/live
            port: 8080
          periodSeconds: 3
      serviceAccountName: dynamic_parameters

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource dynamic_parameters/Deployment/emissary-apiext

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource dynamic_parameters/Deployment/emissary-apiext

1 - autogen-require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule autogen-require-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource dynamic_parameters/Deployment/emissary-apiext failed:

##### FILE: apiserver18_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/apiserver:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: kubeeye-apiserver
  name: apiserver
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: kubeeye-apiserver
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 25%!
(MISSING)      maxUnavailable: 25%!
(MISSING)    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: kubeeye-apiserver
      name: kubeeye-apiserver
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: GIN_MODE
          value: release
        image: kubespheredev/kubeeye-apiserver:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 9090
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
          timeoutSeconds: 10
        name: kubeeye-apiserver
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 9090
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/localtime
          name: localtime
        - mountPath: /kubeeye/data
          name: inspect-result
          readOnly: true
      restartPolicy: Always
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1000
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc/localtime
        name: localtime
      - name: inspect-result
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: inspect-result

---

apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1

  - nodes/stats
  - nodes/log
  - nodes/spec

  name: RESOURCE_NAME
  namespace: default

  service:
    name: SERVICE_NAME
    namespace: SERVICE_NAMESPACE

##### FILE: apiset_editor_role.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ClusterRole/apiset-editor-role:
apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
kind: ClusterRole
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: rbac
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: kube-cgi
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: apiset-editor-role
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: clusterrole
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: kube-cgi
    rbac.authorization.k8s.io/aggregate-to-admin: "true"
    rbac.authorization.k8s.io/aggregate-to-edit: "true"
  name: apiset-editor-role
  namespace: default
rules:
- apiGroups:
  - kube-cgi.aic.cs.nycu.edu.tw
  resources:
  - apisets
  verbs:
  - create
  - delete
  - get
  - list
  - patch
  - update
  - watch
- apiGroups:
  - kube-cgi.aic.cs.nycu.edu.tw
  resources:
  - apisets/status
  verbs:
  - get

##### FILE: apisix-ingress-cm.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/apisix-ingress-cm:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  config.yaml: |
    # log options
    log_level: "info"    # the error log level, default is info, optional values are:
                         # debug
                         # info
                         # warn
                         # error
                         # panic
                         # fatal
    log_output: "stderr" # the output file path of error log, default is stderr, when
                         # the file path is "stderr" or "stdout", logs are marshalled
                         # plainly, which is more readable for human; otherwise logs
                         # are marshalled in JSON format, which can be parsed by
                         # programs easily.

    http_listen: ":8080"   # the HTTP Server listen address, default is ":8080"
    enable_profiling: true # enable profiling via web interfaces
                           # host:port/debug/pprof, default is true.
    apisix_resource_sync_interval: 1h # Default interval for synchronizing Kubernetes resources to APISIX
    # Kubernetes related configurations.
    kubernetes:
      kubeconfig: ""         # the Kubernetes configuration file path, default is
                             # "", so the in-cluster configuration will be used.
      resync_interval: "6h" # how long should api7-ingress-controller
                             # re-synchronizes with Kubernetes, default is 6h,
                             # and the minimal resync interval is 30s.

    # APISIX related configurations.
    apisix:
      base_url: "http://apisix-admin:9180/apisix/admin" # the APISIX admin api / manager api
                                               # base url, it's required.
      admin_key: "edd1c9f034335f136f87ad84b625c8f1"
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: apisix-ingress-cm
  namespace: default

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0 

##### FILE: api-tester-deploy.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/api-tester:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: api-tester
  name: api-tester
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: api-tester
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: api-tester
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --namespace
        - $(NAMESPACE)
        - --interval
        - $(INTERVAL)
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          value: default
        - name: INTERVAL
          value: "30"
        image: docker.io/schoolofdevops/api-tester:latest
        name: api-tester
      restartPolicy: Always

---


Mutation:

  name: apitoken-viewer-role
  namespace: default
rules:
- apiGroups:
  - quay.herve4m.github.io
  resources:
  - apitokens
  verbs:
  - get
  - list
  - watch
- apiGroups:
  - quay.herve4m.github.io
  resources:
  - apitokens/status
  verbs:
  - get

---

Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

          value: "1"

##### FILE: api-with-readiness.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/numbers-api:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    kiamol: ch12
  name: numbers-api
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: numbers-api
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: numbers-api
        version: v2
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: FailAfterCallCount
          value: "1"
        image: kiamol/ch03-numbers-api
        name: api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: api
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 80
          periodSeconds: 5
      restartPolicy: Always

---

##### FILE: api-with-readiness-and-liveness.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/numbers-api:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    kiamol: ch12
  name: numbers-api
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: numbers-api
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: numbers-api
        version: v3
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: FailAfterCallCount
          value: "1"
        image: kiamol/ch03-numbers-api
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 2
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: api
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 80
          periodSeconds: 5
      restartPolicy: Always

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/numbers-api

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/numbers-api
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/Deployment/numbers-api failed:
1 - validate-podcontroller-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed for pod controllers. rule validate-podcontroller-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/Deployment/numbers-api failed:
1 - autogen-require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule autogen-require-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Deployment/numbers-api failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource default/Deployment/numbers-api failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy require-requests-limits -> resource default/Deployment/numbers-api failed:
1 - autogen-validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule autogen-validate-resources failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/resources/

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/numbers-api:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    kiamol: ch12
  name: numbers-api
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: numbers-api
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: numbers-api
        version: v3
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: FailAfterCallCount
          value: "1"
        image: kiamol/ch03-numbers-api
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 2
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: api
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 80
          periodSeconds: 5
      restartPolicy: Always

  namespace: reverse-proxy

  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: reverse-proxy-apl
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: reverse-proxy-apl
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: SPANNER_EMULATOR_HOST
          value: spanner-emulator:9010
        - name: SPRING_CLOUD_GCP_SPANNER_EMULATOR-HOST
          value: spanner-emulator.reverse-proxy.svc.cluster.local:9010
        image: reverse-proxy-apl
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: reverse-proxy-apl
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 256Mi

##### FILE: apm-server1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to elastic-stack/ConfigMap/apm-server-config:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  apm-server.yml: |-
    apm-server:
      host: "0.0.0.0:8200"

      rum:
        enabled: true
        event_rate.limit: 300
        event_rate.lru_size: 1000
        allow_origins: ['*']
        library_pattern: "node_modules|bower_components|~"
        exclude_from_grouping: "^/webpack"
        source_mapping.enabled: true
        source_mapping.cache.expiration: 5m
        source_mapping.index_pattern: "apm-*-sourcemap*"

      frontend:
        enabled: false

    setup.template.settings:
      index:
        number_of_shards: 1
        codec: best_compression

    output.elasticsearch:
      enabled: true
      protocol: "http"
      ssl.enabled: false
      hosts: ["${ELASTICSEARCH_HOST:elasticsearch}:${ELASTICSEARCH_PORT:9200}"]
      username: ${ELASTICSEARCH_USERNAME}
      password: ${ELASTICSEARCH_PASSWORD}

    setup.kibana:
      host: '${KIBANA_HOST:kibana}:${KIBANA_PORT:5601}'
      path: ${KIBANA_PATH}
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: apm-server
  name: apm-server-config
  namespace: elastic-stack

---

##### FILE: apm-server1_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to elastic-stack/StatefulSet/apm-server:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: apm-server
  namespace: elastic-stack
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: apm-server
  serviceName: apm-server
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: apm-server
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ELASTICSEARCH_HOST
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: ELASTICSEARCH_HOST
              name: elastic-secret
        - name: ELASTICSEARCH_PORT
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: ELASTICSEARCH_PORT
              name: elastic-secret
        - name: ELASTICSEARCH_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: ELASTIC_USERNAME
              name: elastic-secret
        - name: ELASTICSEARCH_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: ELASTIC_PASSWORD
              name: elastic-secret
        - name: KIBANA_HOST
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: KIBANA_HOST
              name: elastic-secret
        - name: KIBANA_PORT
          value: "5601"
        - name: KIBANA_PATH
          value: /monitoring/ui
        image: docker.elastic.co/apm/apm-server:7.17.9
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: apm-server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8200
          name: apm-port
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 1Gi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/apm-server/apm-server.yml
          name: apm-server-config
          readOnly: true
          subPath: apm-server.yml
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: apm-server-config
        name: apm-server-config

---

##### FILE: apod-api.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/NetworkPolicy/apod-api:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    kubernetes.courselabs.co: networkpolicy
  name: apod-api
  namespace: default
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: TCP
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          kubernetes.io/metadata.name: kube-system
      podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          k8s-app: kube-dns
  - ports:
    - port: 443
      protocol: TCP
    to:
    - ipBlock:
        cidr: 15.200.69.242/24
    - ipBlock:
        cidr: 3.30.35.101/24
  ingress:
  - from:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: apod-web
    ports:
    - port: api
  podSelector:
    matchLabels:
      app: apod-api

---

##### FILE: apollo-depl.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/apollo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: apollo
  name: apollo
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: apollo
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: apollo
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - bash
        - -c
        - |
          while ! nc -z ${NEO4J_INSTANCE_NAME} ${NEO4J_PORT}; do
            echo "waiting for database"
            sleep 1
          done
          node dist/src/index.js
        env:
        - name: NEO4J_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: neo4j_password
              name: ikg-neo4j-secret
        - name: NEO4J_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: neo4j_user
              name: ikg-neo4j-secret
        - name: API_KEYS
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: api_keys
              name: apollo-secret
        - name: DOCKER_DIGEST
          value: ${APOLLO_DOCKER_IMAGE_DIGEST}
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: apollo-config
        image: ${APOLLO_DOCKER_IMAGE_NAME}:${APOLLO_DOCKER_IMAGE_TAG}
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 4000
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: apollo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 4000
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 4000
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            ephemeral-storage: 3Gi
            memory: 0.5Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 200m
            ephemeral-storage: 2Gi
            memory: 0.25Gi
      restartPolicy: Always
      serviceAccountName: svph-ksa

---

##### FILE: app-11.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/app-one:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: app-one
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: app-one
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: app-one
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app.kubernetes.io/name
                operator: In
                values:
                - app-two
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - image: nginx:latest
        name: app-one-container

---

##### FILE: app-a-v1_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/my-app-a-v1:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: my-app
  name: my-app-a-v1
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: my-app-a
      version: v1.0.0
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/port: "9101"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: my-app-a
        version: v1.0.0
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: VERSION
          value: v1.0.0
        image: containersol/k8s-deployment-strategies
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /live
            port: probe
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: my-app-a
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http
        - containerPort: 8086
          name: probe
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /ready
            port: probe
          periodSeconds: 5

---

1 - validate-podcontroller-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed for pod controllers. rule validate-podcontroller-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/Deployment/my-app-a-v1 failed:
1 - autogen-require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule autogen-require-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Deployment/my-app-a-v1 failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Deployment/my-app-a-v1 failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

1 - autogen-validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule autogen-validate-resources failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/resources/

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource default/Deployment/my-app-a-v1 failed:
1 - autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/securityContext/

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Service/my-app-a-v1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  labels:
    app: my-app
  name: my-app-a-v1
  namespace: default

  ports:

    port: 80
    targetPort: http
  selector:

    version: v1.0.0

##### FILE: app-a-v12_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/my-app-a-v1:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: my-app
  name: my-app-a-v1
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: my-app-a
      version: v1.0.0
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/port: "9101"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: my-app-a
        version: v1.0.0
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: VERSION
          value: v1.0.0
        image: containersol/k8s-deployment-strategies
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /live
            port: probe
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: my-app-a
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http
        - containerPort: 8086
          name: probe
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /ready
            port: probe
          periodSeconds: 5

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/my-app-a-v1

##### FILE: app-back-statefulset.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/your-app-back-statefulset:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: your-app-back-statefulset
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: your-app-back
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: your-app-back
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: env-configmap
        image: aluracursos/sistema-noticias:1
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 20
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: your-app-back-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /inserir_noticias.php
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 3
          periodSeconds: 10
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/www/html/uploads
          name: imagens
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: sessao
      volumes:
      - name: imagens
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: your-app-back-images
      - name: sessao
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: your-app-back-sessao

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

            path: /ready

##### FILE: app-b-v12_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/my-app-b-v1:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: my-app
  name: my-app-b-v1
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: my-app-b
      version: v1.0.0
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/port: "9101"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: my-app-b
        version: v1.0.0
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: VERSION
          value: v1.0.0
        image: containersol/k8s-deployment-strategies
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /live
            port: probe
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: my-app-b
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http
        - containerPort: 8086
          name: probe
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /ready
            port: probe
          periodSeconds: 5

---

##### FILE: app-b-v23_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/my-app-b-v2:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: my-app
  name: my-app-b-v2
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: my-app-b
      version: v2.0.0
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/port: "9101"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: my-app-b
        version: v2.0.0
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: VERSION
          value: v2.0.0
        image: containersol/k8s-deployment-strategies
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /live
            port: probe
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: my-app-b
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http
        - containerPort: 8086
          name: probe
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /ready
            port: probe
          periodSeconds: 5

---

    - name: CONFIGMAP_PARAM
      valueFrom:
        configMapKeyRef:
          key: config-param
          name: app-config

    imagePullPolicy: Always
    name: mypod
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /config
      name: config-volume
  restartPolicy: Never
  volumes:

      name: app-config
    name: config-volume

##### FILE: app-configmap6.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/app-config:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  index.php: |
    <?php
    $dbname = getenv('MYSQL_DATABASE');
    $dbuser = getenv('MYSQL_USER');
    $dbpass = getenv('MYSQL_PASSWORD');
    $dbhost = getenv('MYSQL_HOST');

    if (empty($dbname) || empty($dbuser) || empty($dbpass) || empty($dbhost)) {
      die("Missing MySQL environment variables. Make sure MYSQL_DATABASE, MYSQL_USER, MYSQL_PASSWORD, and MYSQL_HOST are set.");
    }

    $connect = mysqli_connect($dbhost, $dbuser, $dbpass, $dbname);

    if (!$connect) {
      die("Unable to connect to '$dbhost'. Error: " . mysqli_connect_error());
    }

    $test_query = "SHOW TABLES FROM $dbname";

    $result = mysqli_query($connect, $test_query);
    if (!$result) {
      die("Error in query: " . mysqli_error($connect));
    }

    echo "Connected successfully";
    mysqli_close($connect);
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: app-config
  namespace: default

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0 

##### FILE: app-configmap7.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/app-config:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  index.php: |
    <?php
    $dbname = getenv('MYSQL_DATABASE');
    $dbuser = getenv('MYSQL_USER');
    $dbpass = getenv('MYSQL_PASSWORD');
    $dbhost = getenv('MYSQL_HOST');

    if (empty($dbname) || empty($dbuser) || empty($dbpass) || empty($dbhost)) {
      die("Missing MySQL environment variables. Make sure MYSQL_DATABASE, MYSQL_USER, MYSQL_PASSWORD, and MYSQL_HOST are set.");
    }

    $connect = mysqli_connect($dbhost, $dbuser, $dbpass, $dbname);

    if (!$connect) {
      die("Unable to connect to '$dbhost'. Error: " . mysqli_connect_error());
    }

    $test_query = "SHOW TABLES FROM $dbname";

    $result = mysqli_query($connect, $test_query);
    if (!$result) {
      die("Error in query: " . mysqli_error($connect));
    }

    echo "Connected successfully";
    mysqli_close($connect);
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: app-config
  namespace: default

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/app-config:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: app-config
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - env:
    - name: CONFIGMAP_PARAM
      valueFrom:
        configMapKeyRef:
          key: config-param
          name: app-config
    image: redis
    imagePullPolicy: Always
    name: mypod
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /config
      name: config-volume
  restartPolicy: Never
  volumes:
  - configMap:
      name: app-config
    name: config-volume

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: app-contador
    maintainer: matiops
  name: app-contador-deployment
  namespace: intro-k8s
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: app-contador
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: app-contador
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: matiops/intro-k8s:app-contador
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: app-contador
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
      - image: redis
        name: redis-contador
        ports:
        - containerPort: 6379

          containers:
          - args:

            - -ec
            - curl http://application-service:8080/hello
            image: buildpack-deps:20.04-curl
            imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
            name: application-cronjob-container
          restartPolicy: Never
  schedule: '*/1 * * * *'

##### FILE: app-dep.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/vproapp:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: vproapp
  name: vproapp
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: vproapp
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: vproapp
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: vprofile/vprofileapp
        name: vproapp
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: vproapp-port
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - until nslookup vprodb.$(cat /var/run/secrets/kubernetes.io/serviceaccount/namespace).svc.cluster.local;
          do echo waiting for mydb; sleep 2; done;
        image: busybox
        name: init-mydb
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - until nslookup vprocache01.$(cat /var/run/secrets/kubernetes.io/serviceaccount/namespace).svc.cluster.local;
          do echo waiting for mydb; sleep 2; done;
        image: busybox
        name: init-memcache

---

##### FILE: app-deploy.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/mongodbb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: mongodbb
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodbb
  serviceName: mongodbb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodbb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          value: admin
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: testtesttest
        image: mongo
        name: mongodbb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongodbb-data
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mongodbb-data
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi
      storageClassName: my-storageclass

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/backend-webapp:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    type: webapp
  name: backend-webapp
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 20
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: webapp
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: webapp
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: type
                operator: In
                values:
                - webapp
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    type: webapp

  replicas: 20
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: webapp
  template:

    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: type
                operator: In
                values:
                - webapp
                - app
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: app

##### FILE: app-deploy25.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/mongodb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: mongodb
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  serviceName: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          value: admin
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: testtesttest
        image: mongo
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongodb-data
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mongodb-data
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi
      storageClassName: ebs-storage

---

##### FILE: app-deploy27.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/pedidos-app:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: pedidos-app
  name: pedidos-app
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: pedidos-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: pedidos-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DB_PORT
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: port
              name: dbport
        - name: DB_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: dbusername
        - name: DB_PASS
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: dbpassword
        - name: DB_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: database
              name: dbname
        - name: DB_HOST
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: db_host
              name: postgres-private-ip
        image: devatron/tc-2023-repo:latest

##### FILE: app-deploy3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/webapp:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    type: webapp
  name: webapp
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 20
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: webapp
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: webapp
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: type
                operator: In
                values:
                - webapp
                - app
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

---

        name: webapp

            memory: 100Mi

kind: Deployment

  name: web-game
  namespace: default

  minReadySeconds: 5
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: web-game
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: web-game
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: mylabacr13.azurecr.io/web-game:tag
        name: web-game
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux

##### FILE: app-deploy7.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/appdjango:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: web
    app.kubernetes.io/name: appdjango
  name: appdjango
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: web
      app.kubernetes.io/name: appdjango
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: web
        app.kubernetes.io/name: appdjango
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: user
              name: pg-credentials
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: pg-credentials
        - name: POSTGRES_DB
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: db_name
              name: pg-credentials
        - name: DATABASE_URL
          value: postgresql://$(POSTGRES_USER):$(POSTGRES_PASSWORD)@pg:5432/$(POSTGRES_DB)
        image: testmaxdev/django-postgresql-image:1.0.2
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: appdjango-deploy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
          name: http

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: spring-boot-mysql-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: spring-boot-k8s-mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: spring-boot-k8s-mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DB_HOST
          value: localhost:3306
        - name: DB_NAME
          value: huseyin_aydin_db
        - name: DB_USERNAME
          value: root
        - name: DB_PASSWORD
          value: toor
        image: spring-boot-mysql-k8s-3:latest
        name: spring-boot-mysql-k8s-3
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8084

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/hello-world-app:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    deployment.kubernetes.io/revision: "1"
  generation: 2
  labels:
    app: hello-world-app
  name: hello-world-app
  namespace: default
spec:
  progressDeadlineSeconds: 600
  replicas: 2
  revisionHistoryLimit: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: hello-world-app
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 25%!
(MISSING)      maxUnavailable: 25%!
(MISSING)    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        linkerd.io/inject: enabled
      labels:
        app: hello-world-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: NAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: NAME
              name: hello-world-secret
        image: registry.digitalocean.com/z9pxj2-python-example/hello-world-app:v0.2.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: hello-world-app
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            memory: 50Mi
        terminationMessagePath: /dev/termination-log
        terminationMessagePolicy: File
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      restartPolicy: Always
      schedulerName: default-scheduler
      securityContext: {}
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
status:
  availableReplicas: 3
  conditions:
  - message: ReplicaSet "hello-world-app-7df7df6cd" has successfully progressed.
    reason: NewReplicaSetAvailable
    status: "True"
    type: Progressing
  - message: Deployment has minimum availability.
    reason: MinimumReplicasAvailable
    status: "True"
    type: Available
  observedGeneration: 2
  readyReplicas: 3
  replicas: 3
  updatedReplicas: 3

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/springboot-crud-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: springboot-crud-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: springboot-k8s-mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: springboot-k8s-mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_HOST
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: dbName
              name: db-config
        - name: DB_HOST
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: host
              name: db-config
        image: webdevloper/node-final-api-saddam:v2
        name: my-nodejs
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to example-app/Deployment/example-app-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: example-app
  name: example-app-deployment
  namespace: example-app
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: example-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: example-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: USER_NAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-user
              name: mongo-secret
        - name: USER_PWD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-password
              name: mongo-secret
        - name: DB_URL
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: mongo-url
              name: mongo-config
        image: romiari/k8s-demo-app:v3.1
        name: example-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8020
