##### FILE: app-deployment2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/app:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    kompose.cmd: kompose convert -c -o chart
    kompose.service.expose: pixelfed.k3s.local
    kompose.service.expose.ingress-class-name: nginx
    kompose.version: 1.29.0 (b6b708b6)
    kompose.volume.size: 10G
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    io.kompose.service: app
  name: app
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      io.kompose.service: app
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kompose.cmd: kompose convert -c -o chart
        kompose.service.expose: pixelfed.k3s.local
        kompose.service.expose.ingress-class-name: nginx
        kompose.version: 1.29.0 (b6b708b6)
        kompose.volume.size: 10G
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        io.kompose.network/pixelfed-external: "true"
        io.kompose.network/pixelfed-internal: "true"
        io.kompose.service: app
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: pixelfed-env
        image: registry:5000/pixelfed
        name: app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          hostPort: 8080
          protocol: TCP
        resources: {}
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/www/storage
          name: app-storage
        - mountPath: /etc/ssl/certs
          name: k3s-bundle
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - for i in $(seq 1 300); do nc -zvw1 db 3306 && exit 0 || sleep 3; done; exit
          1
        image: alpine
        name: init-wait
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: app-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: app-storage
      - configMap:
          name: k3s-bundle
        name: k3s-bundle
status: {}

---

##### FILE: app-deployment23.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/application-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: application-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: application
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: application
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: APP_NAME
          value: application
        - name: APP_HEALTH_DELAY
          value: "19000"
        image: bitxon/app
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 2
          httpGet:
            path: /management/health/liveness
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 0
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: application
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          httpGet:
            path: /management/health/readiness
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 0
          periodSeconds: 3
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 4
          httpGet:
            path: /management/health/startup
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 5

---

##### FILE: app-deployment25.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/app:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    service: app
  name: app
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      service: app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        network/mailer-micro-service-default: "true"
        service: app
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - /usr/local/bin/mailer-micro-service
        env:
        - name: POSTGRES_DB
          value: postgres
        - name: POSTGRES_HOST
          value: postgres
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          value: example
        - name: POSTGRES_PORT
          value: "5432"
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          value: postgres
        image: mailer-micro-service-app
        imagePullPolicy: Never
        name: app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          hostPort: 8080
          protocol: TCP
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - until pg_isready -h postgres -p 5432; do echo waiting for database; sleep
          2; done;
        image: postgres:16.1
        name: check-db-ready
      restartPolicy: Always

---

##### FILE: app-deployment31.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/backend:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: backend
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: backend
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: backend
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: midjankacirani/detyrekursi:6
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 60
        name: backend
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 60
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 1024Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 1024Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 10001
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault

---

##### FILE: app-deployment34.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to demo-ns/Deployment/vso-db-demo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    test: vso-db-demo
  name: vso-db-demo
  namespace: demo-ns
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      test: vso-db-demo
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxUnavailable: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        test: vso-db-demo
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DB_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: vso-db-demo
        - name: DB_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: vso-db-demo
        image: nginx:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            httpHeaders:
            - name: X-Custom-Header
              value: Awesome
            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 3
          periodSeconds: 3
        name: example
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 50Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/secrets
          name: secrets
          readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - name: secrets
        secret:
          secretName: vso-db-demo

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource demo-ns/Deployment/vso-db-demo

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource demo-ns/Deployment/vso-db-demo
policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource demo-ns/Deployment/vso-db-demo failed:
1 - autogen-validate-image-tag validation failure: validation error: Using a mutable image tag e.g. 'latest' is not allowed. rule autogen-validate-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource demo-ns/Deployment/vso-db-demo failed:

kind: Deployment

      app: api-server
  template:

        - -c

        command:
        - /bin/bash

            name: api-server-config

##### FILE: app-deployment59_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/todos:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: todos
  name: todos
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: todos
      tier: frontend
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: todos
        tier: frontend
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_HOST
          value: todos-mysql
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mysql-pass
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          value: todos
        - name: MYSQL_DB
          value: todos
        image: app
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: todos
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
          name: todos
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/www/html
          name: todos-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: todos-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: wp-pv-claim

---

##### FILE: app-deployment6.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/hello-world-app:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    deployment.kubernetes.io/revision: "1"
  generation: 2
  labels:
    app: hello-world-app
  name: hello-world-app
  namespace: default
spec:
  progressDeadlineSeconds: 600
  replicas: 2
  revisionHistoryLimit: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: hello-world-app
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 25%!
(MISSING)      maxUnavailable: 25%!
(MISSING)    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        linkerd.io/inject: enabled
      labels:
        app: hello-world-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: NAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: NAME
              name: hello-world-secret
        image: registry.digitalocean.com/z9pxj2-python-example/hello-world-app:v0.2.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: hello-world-app
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            memory: 50Mi
        terminationMessagePath: /dev/termination-log
        terminationMessagePolicy: File
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      restartPolicy: Always
      schedulerName: default-scheduler
      securityContext: {}
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
status:
  availableReplicas: 3
  conditions:
  - message: ReplicaSet "hello-world-app-7df7df6cd" has successfully progressed.
    reason: NewReplicaSetAvailable
    status: "True"
    type: Progressing
  - message: Deployment has minimum availability.
    reason: MinimumReplicasAvailable
    status: "True"
    type: Available
  observedGeneration: 2
  readyReplicas: 3
  replicas: 3
  updatedReplicas: 3

---

##### FILE: app-deployment63.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to app-network/Deployment/flask-app-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: flask-app-deployment
  namespace: app-network
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: flask-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: flask-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_HOST
          value: mysql-service
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_USER
              name: mysql-user-config
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
              name: mysql-secret
        - name: MYSQL_DB
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_DB
              name: mysql-user-config
        image: sandeepkale000/test-app::latest
        name: flask-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000

---

##### FILE: app-deployment66_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/hello-py:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: hello-py
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: hello-py
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 3
      maxUnavailable: 2
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: hello-py
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: CONTAINER_IMAGE
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: hello-py
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          privileged: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true

---

##### FILE: app-deployment7.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/app:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    kompose.cmd: kompose convert -c -o chart
    kompose.service.expose: pixelfed.k3s.local
    kompose.service.expose.ingress-class-name: nginx
    kompose.version: 1.29.0 (b6b708b6)
    kompose.volume.size: 10G
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    io.kompose.service: app
  name: app
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      io.kompose.service: app
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kompose.cmd: kompose convert -c -o chart
        kompose.service.expose: pixelfed.k3s.local
        kompose.service.expose.ingress-class-name: nginx
        kompose.version: 1.29.0 (b6b708b6)
        kompose.volume.size: 10G
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        io.kompose.network/pixelfed-external: "true"
        io.kompose.network/pixelfed-internal: "true"
        io.kompose.service: app
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: pixelfed-env
        image: registry:5000/pixelfed
        name: app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          hostPort: 8080
          protocol: TCP
        resources: {}
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/www/storage
          name: app-storage
        - mountPath: /etc/ssl/certs
          name: k3s-bundle
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - for i in $(seq 1 300); do nc -zvw1 db 3306 && exit 0 || sleep 3; done; exit
          1
        image: alpine
        name: init-wait
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: app-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: app-storage
      - configMap:
          name: k3s-bundle
        name: k3s-bundle
status: {}

---

kind: Deployment

  name: giropops-senhas
  namespace: default

  replicas: 1

    matchLabels:
      app: giropops-senhas

      labels:
        app: giropops-senhas
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: REDIS_HOST
          value: redis-service
        image: linuxtips/giropops-senhas:1.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: giropops-senhas
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 64Mi

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/springboot-crud-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: springboot-crud-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: springboot-k8s-mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: springboot-k8s-mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DB_HOST
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: host
              name: db-config
        - name: DB_NAME
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: dbName
              name: db-config
        - name: DB_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: mysql-secrets
        - name: DB_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mysql-secrets
        image: springboot-crud-k8s:1.0
        name: springboot-crud-k8s
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080

---

      app: laravel-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: laravel-app
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: node-role
                operator: In
                values:
                - frontend
      containers:
      - image: compsphere-project-fix-app:latest
        name: laravel-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000

##### FILE: app-deployment80.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to dev-to/Deployment/myapp:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: myapp
  name: myapp
  namespace: dev-to
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: myapp
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: myapp
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: myapp
        image: java-k8s:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Never
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /app/actuator/health/liveness
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
        name: myapp
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /app/actuator/health/readiness
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 1024Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 512Mi

---


Mutation:

##### FILE: app-deployment85.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to keda-cluster/Deployment/rabbitmq-consumer:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: rabbitmq-consumer
  namespace: keda-cluster
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: rabbitmq-consumer
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: rabbitmq-consumer
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - |2

          import pika

          connection = pika.BlockingConnection(pika.ConnectionParameters(host='rabbitmq', port=5672))

          channel = connection.channel()

          channel.queue_declare(queue='hello_queue')



          def callback(ch, method, properties, body):

              print("Received message:", body)



          channel.basic_consume(queue='hello_queue', on_message_callback=callback, auto_ack=True)



          print('Waiting for messages. To exit press CTRL+C')

          channel.start_consuming()
        command:
        - python
        - -u
        - -c
        env:
        - name: PYTHONUNBUFFERED
          value: "1"
        image: farhanhub/rabbitmq-producer:latest
        name: consumer

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource keda-cluster/Deployment/rabbitmq-consumer

1 - autogen-validate-image-tag validation failure: validation error: Using a mutable image tag e.g. 'latest' is not allowed. rule autogen-validate-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource keda-cluster/Deployment/rabbitmq-consumer failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource keda-cluster/Deployment/rabbitmq-consumer failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

  name: wiki-app-deployment
  namespace: default

  replicas: 1

    matchLabels:
      app: wiki-app
  template:

      labels:
        app: wiki-app

      containers:
      - env:
        - name: INGRESS_PORT
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: INGRESS_PORT
              name: wiki-secret
        - name: INGRESS_HOST
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: INGRESS_HOST
              name: wiki-secret
        - name: SERVICE_HOSTNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: SERVICE_HOSTNAME
              name: wiki-secret
        - name: SENTENCE_TRANSFORMERS_HOME
          value: ./.cache
        - name: HF_HOME
          value: ./.cache
        - name: TOKENIZERS_PARALLELISM
          value: "false"
        image: aayushsubramaniam/wikispeaks:v2
        name: wiki-app-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8501

##### FILE: app-deployment94.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to nagpdemo/Deployment/api-service:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: api-service
  name: api-service
  namespace: nagpdemo
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: api-service
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: api-service
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DB_HOST
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_HOST
              name: db-config
        - name: DB_NAME
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_DATABASE
              name: db-config
        - name: DB_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: DB_USER
              name: api-db-credentials
        - name: DB_PASS
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: DB_PASSWORD
              name: api-db-credentials
        - name: DB_PORT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_DB_PORT
              name: db-config
        image: singhsahil2711/db-access-service:latest
        name: api-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 75m
            memory: 128Mi

---

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource nagpdemo/Deployment/api-service failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

##### FILE: app-front-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/your-app-front-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: your-app-front-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: your-app-front
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: your-app-front
        name: your-app-front
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: env-configmap
        image: aluracursos/portal-noticias:1
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 20
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: your-app-front-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 3
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 10m

---

apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    cert-manager.io/cluster-issuer: letsencrypt-prod
    kubernetes.io/ingress.class: nginx-romo
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/rewrite-target: /
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/secure-backends: true"
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/ssl-passthrough: "true"
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/ssl-redirect: "true"
  name: example-app-ingress
  namespace: example-app
spec:
  ingressClassName: nginx-romo
  rules:
  - host: romiari.me
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: example-app-service
            port:
              number: 8020
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix
  - host: www.romiari.me
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: example-app-service
            port:
              number: 8020
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix
  tls:
  - hosts:
    - romiari.me
    - www.romiari.me
    secretName: example-app-secret

##### FILE: app-ingress210.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/api-deplo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: api-server
  name: api-deplo
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: api-server
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: api-server
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - echo Soy app numero 2 desde $HOSTNAME > /usr/share/nginx/html/index.html
          && nginx -g 'daemon off;'
        image: nginx:alpine
        name: nginx

---

    kubernetes.io/ingress.class: nginx
  name: app-ingress
  namespace: default
spec:
  rules:
  - host: test.petchblog.net
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: app-service
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix

    - test.petchblog.net
    secretName: app-tls

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/app:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/auth-response-headers: X-User,X-Email,X-UserId,X-First-Name,X-Last-Name
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/auth-signin: http://$host/signin
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/auth-url: http://auth.auth.svc.cluster.local:9000/auth
  name: app
  namespace: default
spec:
  rules:
  - host: arch.homework
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: app
            port:
              number: 9000
        path: /users/
        pathType: Prefix

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/app:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    cert-manager.io/cluster-issuer: k3s-ca-issuer
    kompose.cmd: kompose convert -c -o chart
    kompose.service.expose: pixelfed.k3s.local
    kompose.service.expose.ingress-class-name: nginx
    kompose.version: 1.29.0 (b6b708b6)
    kompose.volume.size: 10G
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    io.kompose.service: app
  name: app
  namespace: default
spec:
  ingressClassName: nginx
  rules:
  - host: pixelfed.k3s.local
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: app
            port:
              number: 8080
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix
  tls:
  - hosts:
    - pixelfed.k3s.local
    secretName: pixelfed-cert
status:
  loadBalancer: {}

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/app:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    cert-manager.io/cluster-issuer: k3s-ca-issuer
    kompose.cmd: kompose convert -c -o chart
    kompose.service.expose: pixelfed.k3s.local
    kompose.service.expose.ingress-class-name: nginx
    kompose.version: 1.29.0 (b6b708b6)
    kompose.volume.size: 10G
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    io.kompose.service: app
  name: app
  namespace: default
spec:
  ingressClassName: nginx
  rules:
  - host: pixelfed.k3s.local
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: app
            port:
              number: 8080
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix
  tls:
  - hosts:
    - pixelfed.k3s.local
    secretName: pixelfed-cert
status:
  loadBalancer: {}

##### FILE: app-job.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/app-job-rsync:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: app-job-rsync
  namespace: default
spec:
  backoffLimit: 0
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - rsync -avz gs://glow-sportradar/ /data/input
        image: google/cloud-sdk:275.0.0-alpine
        name: init
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/input
          name: data-input
      restartPolicy: Never
      volumes:
      - gcePersistentDisk:
          fsType: ext4
          pdName: glow-data-disk-200
        name: data-input

---

  name: app-job-rsync
  namespace: default

  backoffLimit: 0
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - gsutil -m rsync -dr gs://glow-sportradar/ /data/input
        image: google/cloud-sdk:275.0.0-alpine
        name: init
        volumeMounts:

          name: data-input

          fsType: ext4

  name: app-job-rsync
  namespace: default
spec:
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: init
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - gsutil -m rsync -r -d gs://glow-sportradar/ /data/input
        image: google/cloud-sdk:275.0.0-alpine
        name: init
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/input
          name: input-data
      restartPolicy: Never
      volumes:
      - gcePersistentDisk:
          fsType: ext4
          pdName: glow-data-disk-200
        name: input-data

      - command:

##### FILE: app-job13.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/app-job-rsync:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: app-job-rsync
  namespace: default
spec:
  backoffLimit: 0
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - gsutil -m rsync -dr gs://glow-sportradar/ /data/input
        image: google/cloud-sdk:275.0.0-alpine
        lifecycle:
          postStart:
            exec:
              command: []
          preStop:
            exec:
              command:
              - /bin/sh
              - -c
              - echo Stop from the...
        name: init
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/input
          name: data-input
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - gsutil -m rsync -dr gs://glow-sportradar/ /data/input
        image: google/cloud-sdk:275.0.0-alpine
        name: init
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/input
          name: data-input
      restartPolicy: Never
      volumes:
      - gcePersistentDisk:
          fsType: ext4
          pdName: glow-data-disk-200
        name: data-input
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: data-output

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Job/app-job-rsync

          readOnly: false

##### FILE: app-job9.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/app-job-rsync:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: app-job-rsync
  namespace: default
spec:
  backoffLimit: 0
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - gsutil -m rsync -dr gs://glow-sportradar/ /data/input
        image: google/cloud-sdk:275.0.0-alpine
        lifecycle:
          postStart:
            exec:
              command: []
          preStop:
            exec:
              command:
              - /bin/sh
              - -c
              - echo Stop from the...
        name: init
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/input
          name: data-input
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - gsutil -m rsync -dr gs://glow-sportradar/ /data/input
        image: google/cloud-sdk:275.0.0-alpine
        name: init
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/input
          name: data-input
      restartPolicy: Never
      volumes:
      - gcePersistentDisk:
          fsType: ext4
          pdName: glow-data-disk-200
        name: data-input
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: data-output

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to demo/Pod/app-livenessprob:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: app-livenessprob
  namespace: demo
spec:
  containers:
  - image: gcr.io/k8s-k3s/demo:v1.0.0
    livenessProbe:
      failureThreshold: 3
      httpGet:
        path: /
        port: 8000
      initialDelaySeconds: 5
      periodSeconds: 10
      timeoutSeconds: 1
    name: app
    ports:
    - containerPort: 8080
      name: http

kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: liveness-app
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: myapp:latest
    livenessProbe:
      failureThreshold: 3

        port: 8080
      initialDelaySeconds: 15
      periodSeconds: 5
      timeoutSeconds: 2

##### FILE: app-livenessProbe14.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/liveness-probe-demo:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: liveness-probe-demo
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: europe-west3-docker.pkg.dev/prometheus-devops-course/gcr-docker-demo/demo:v1.0.0
    livenessProbe:
      exec:
        command:
        - curl
        - -f
        - http://localhost/
      initialDelaySeconds: 15
      periodSeconds: 10
    name: demo
    ports:
    - containerPort: 8080

##### FILE: app-livenessProbe15.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/busybox:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: busybox
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - command:
    - sh
    - -c
    - while true; do sleep 3600; done
    image: registry.k8s.io/busybox
    livenessProbe:
      exec:
        command:
        - echo
        - hello
      initialDelaySeconds: 5
      periodSeconds: 10
    name: busybox-container

---

##### FILE: app-livenessProbe17.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/demo-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: demo
  name: demo-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: demo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: demo
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: gcr.io/level-skyline-417610/demo:v1.1.0
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: demo-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080

---

##### FILE: app-migrations.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/migrations:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: migrations
    app.kubernetes.io/name: appdjango
  name: migrations
  namespace: default
spec:
  activeDeadlineSeconds: 120
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: migrations
        app.kubernetes.io/name: appdjango
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - python
        - manage.py
        - migrate
        env:
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: user
              name: pg-credentials
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: pg-credentials
        - name: POSTGRES_DB
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: db_name
              name: pg-credentials
        - name: DATABASE_URL
          value: postgresql://$(POSTGRES_USER):$(POSTGRES_PASSWORD)@pg:5432/$(POSTGRES_DB)
        image: testmaxdev/django-postgresql-image:1.0.2
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: migrations
      restartPolicy: Never

---


Mutation:

##### FILE: app-multicontainer.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/app-multi-containers:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: app-multi-containers
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: nginx
    name: 1st
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
      name: html
  - args:
    - while true; do date > /html/index.html; sleep 1; done
    command:
    - /bin/sh
    - -c
    image: debian
    name: 2nd
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /html
      name: html
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: html

---

kind: Pod
metadata:

    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"

  namespace: default

  containers:
  - image: nginx
    name: nginx-container
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
      name: shared-data
  - command:
    - bash
    - -c
    - echo 'Hello from Ubuntu' > /shared-data/index.html && sleep 3600
    image: ubuntu
    name: ubuntu-container
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /shared-data
      name: shared-data
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: shared-data

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/demo-multicontainer:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: demo
  name: demo-multicontainer
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: demo
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: demo
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: gcr.io/level-skyline-417610/demo:v1.1.0
        name: main-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
      - image: nginx:latest
        name: sidecar-nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
          name: static-content
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: static-content

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/app-multi-containers:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: app-multi-containers
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: nginx
    name: 1st
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
      name: shared-volume
  - command:
    - sh
    - -c
    - while true; do echo $(date) >> /html/index.html; sleep 1; done
    image: debian
    name: 2nd
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /html
      name: shared-volume
      readOnly: false
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: shared-volume

##### FILE: app-multicontainer6.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/app-multi-containers:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: app-multi-containers
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: nginx
    name: 1st
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
      name: shared-volume
  - command:
    - sh
    - -c
    - while true; do echo $(date) >> /html/index.html; sleep 1; done
    image: debian
    name: 2nd
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /html
      name: shared-volume
      readOnly: false
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: shared-volume

---

      name: html

policy add-networkpolicy applied to default/Namespace/my-namespace:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: default-deny
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-deny
  namespace: my-namespace
spec:
  podSelector: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Ingress
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/my-namespace:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: my-namespace
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/my-namespace:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: my-namespace
spec:
  hard:
    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

---

Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/my-namespace:
apiVersion: v1
kind: LimitRange
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-limitrange
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-limitrange
  namespace: my-namespace
spec:
  limits:
  - default:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1Gi
    defaultRequest:
      cpu: 200m
      memory: 256Mi
    type: Container

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/app-one:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: app-one
  name: app-one
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: app-one
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: app-one
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MESSAGE
          value: Hello from App1
        image: paulbouwer/hello-kubernetes:1.10
        name: app-one
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to test/Job/stage-copy-data:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: stage-copy-data
  namespace: test
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - cp /input-data/* /calrissian/input-data/ && cd /calrissian/input-data &&
          ls -a && cat simple-training-app.cwl
        command:
        - /bin/bash
        - -c
        image: dukegcb/calrissian:latest
        name: stage-copy-data
        securityContext:
          runAsGroup: 1000
          runAsUser: 1000
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /calrissian/input-data
          name: calrissian-input-data
        - mountPath: /input-data/inputs.yml
          name: input-conf
          subPath: inputs.yml
        - mountPath: /input-data/simple-training-app.cwl
          name: train-conf
          subPath: simple-training-app.cwl
      restartPolicy: OnFailure
      volumes:
      - name: calrissian-input-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: calrissian-input-data
      - configMap:
          name: input-conf
        name: input-conf
      - configMap:
          name: train-conf
        name: train-conf

---

##### FILE: app-package_7.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to test/Job/simple-training:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: simple-training
  namespace: test
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --debug
        - --stdout
        - /calrissian/output-data/results.json
        - --stderr
        - /calrissian/output-data/app.log
        - --max-ram
        - 4G
        - --max-cores
        - "2"
        - --tmp-outdir-prefix
        - /calrissian/output-data/
        - --outdir
        - /calrissian/output-data/
        - --usage-report
        - /calrissian/output-data/simple-app-usage.json
        - /calrissian/input-data/simple-training-app.cwl
        - /calrissian/input-data/inputs.yml
        command:
        - calrissian
        env:
        - name: CALRISSIAN_POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: MLFLOW_TRACKING_URI
          value: http://mlflow-service:5000
        image: dukegcb/calrissian:latest
        name: calrissian
        securityContext:
          runAsGroup: 1000
          runAsUser: 1000
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /calrissian/input-data
          name: calrissian-input-data
          readOnly: false
        - mountPath: /calrissian/output-data
          name: calrissian-output-data
          readOnly: false
      restartPolicy: Never
      volumes:
      - name: calrissian-input-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: calrissian-input-data
          readOnly: false
      - name: calrissian-output-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: calrissian-output-data

---

##### FILE: app-pods.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/appdjango:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: appdjango
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - env:
    - name: POSTGRES_USER
      valueFrom:
        secretKeyRef:
          key: user
          name: pg-credentials
    - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
      valueFrom:
        secretKeyRef:
          key: password
          name: pg-credentials
    - name: POSTGRES_DB
      valueFrom:
        secretKeyRef:
          key: db_name
          name: pg-credentials
    - name: DATABASE_URL
      value: postgresql://$(POSTGRES_USER):$(POSTGRES_PASSWORD)@pg:5432/$(POSTGRES_DB)
    image: testmaxdev/django-postgresql-image:1.0.2
    imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
    name: appdjango-pod
    ports:
    - containerPort: 8000
      name: http

---

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: nginx-vol
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: nginx:latest
    name: nginx-1
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /app/data
      name: nginx-volume
  - image: nginx:latest
    name: nginx-2
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /app/data
      name: nginx-volume
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: nginx-volume1

##### FILE: app-pod-volume2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/two-containers:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: two-containers
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: nginx
    name: nginx-container
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
      name: shared-data
  - args:
    - -c
    - echo Hello from the debian container > /pod-data/index.html
    command:
    - /bin/sh
    image: debian
    name: debian-container
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /pod-data
      name: shared-data
  restartPolicy: Never
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: shared-data

---

##### FILE: app-readinessProbe.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/app-readinessprob:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: app-readinessprob
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: gcr.io/k8s-k3s/demo:v2.0.0
    livenessProbe:
      failureThreshold: 3
      httpGet:
        path: /
        port: 8000
      initialDelaySeconds: 5
      periodSeconds: 10
      timeoutSeconds: 1
    name: app
    ports:
    - containerPort: 8000
      name: http
    readinessProbe:
      failureThreshold: 3
      httpGet:
        path: /ready
        port: 8000
      initialDelaySeconds: 0
      periodSeconds: 2
      successThreshold: 1

---

##### FILE: app-readinessProbe17.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/demo-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: demo
  name: demo-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: demo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: demo
    spec:

##### FILE: app-replica.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to app-ns/ReplicaSet/application-replicaset:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: ReplicaSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: employees
  name: application-replicaset
  namespace: app-ns
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: application
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: application
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DBPORT
          value: "3306"
        - name: DBHOST
          value: mysql-service.mysql-ns.svc.cluster.local
        - name: DBUSER
          value: root
        - name: DATABASE
          value: employees
        - name: DBPWD
          value: pw
        - name: APP_COLOR
          value: blue
        image: 602646394633.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/clo835-ecr-assignment2:myapp_v0.1
        name: application
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to application/ReplicaSet/app-replicaset:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: ReplicaSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: employees
  name: app-replicaset
  namespace: application
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: employees
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: employees
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DBPORT
          value: "3306"
        - name: DBHOST
          value: mysql.database.svc.cluster.local
        - name: DBUSER
          value: root
        - name: DATABASE
          value: employees
        - name: DBPWD
          value: pw
        - name: APP_COLOR
          value: blue
        image: 848224205131.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/assignment1-repo:app_0.1
        name: app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          protocol: TCP

---

##### FILE: app-resources.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/app-resource:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: app-resource
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: gcr.io/kuar-demo/kuard-amd64:1
    livenessProbe:
      failureThreshold: 3
      httpGet:
        path: /healthy
        port: 8080
      initialDelaySeconds: 5
      periodSeconds: 10
      timeoutSeconds: 1
    name: app
    ports:
    - containerPort: 8080
      name: http
    readinessProbe:
      failureThreshold: 3
      httpGet:
        path: /ready
        port: 8080
      initialDelaySeconds: 0
      periodSeconds: 2
      successThreshold: 1
    resources:
      limits:
        cpu: 100m
        memory: 256Mi
      requests:
        cpu: 100m
        memory: 128Mi

---

##### FILE: app-resources11.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/silly-demo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/name: silly-demo
  name: silly-demo
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: silly-demo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: silly-demo
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MEMORY_LEAK_MAX_MEMORY
          value: "512"
        - name: MEMORY_LEAK_FREQUENCY
          value: "1"
        image: ghcr.io/vfarcic/silly-demo:1.4.123
        name: silly-demo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8080
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 2Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 512Mi

---

kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: app-resource
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: gcr.io/kuar-demo/kuard-amd64:1
    livenessProbe:
      httpGet:

        port: 8080
      initialDelaySeconds: 30
      periodSeconds: 10
    name: app
    ports:
    - containerPort: 8080
      protocol: TCP
    readinessProbe:
      httpGet:
        path: /ready
        port: 8080
      initialDelaySeconds: 10
      periodSeconds: 2
    resources:
      limits:
        cpu: 100m
        memory: 256Mi
      requests:
        cpu: 100m
        memory: 128Mi

            memory: 512Mi

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: app-resource
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: gcr.io/kuar-demo/kuard-amd64:1
    livenessProbe:
      failureThreshold: 3
      httpGet:
        path: /healthy
        port: 8080
      initialDelaySeconds: 5
      periodSeconds: 10
      timeoutSeconds: 1
    name: app
    ports:
    - containerPort: 8080
      name: http
    readinessProbe:
      failureThreshold: 3
      httpGet:
        path: /ready
        port: 8080
      initialDelaySeconds: 0
      periodSeconds: 2
      successThreshold: 1
    resources:
      limits:
        cpu: 100m
        memory: 256Mi
      requests:
        cpu: 100m
        memory: 128Mi

kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: demo
  name: demo-app
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: demo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: demo
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DB_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: DB_PASSWORD
              name: db-secret
        image: gcr.io/level-skyline-417610/demo:v1.1.0
        name: demo-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080

##### FILE: app-secret-env5.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/app-secret-env:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: app-secret-env
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - env:
    - name: SECRET_USERNAME
      valueFrom:
        secretKeyRef:
          key: username
          name: mysecret1
    - name: SECRET_PASSWORD
      valueFrom:
        secretKeyRef:
          key: password
          name: mysecret1
    image: redis
    name: mycontainer
  restartPolicy: Never

---

##### FILE: app-secret-env7.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/redis:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: redis
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: redis
    name: redis
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /redis/secret
      name: secret-volume
      readOnly: true
  volumes:
  - name: secret-volume
    secret:
      secretName: my-secret

---
